title: The Jesus Film - 1979 - Bengali, Kannada, Panjabi, Sinhalese
description:
Summary:
Jesus of Nazareth, the Son of God, was raised by a Jewish carpenter. Based on the gospel of Luke in the New Testament, here is the life of Jesus. From His miraculous virgin birth, to the calling of His disciples, the public miracles which He performed, how He served those around him, His death by crucifixion at the hands of the Roman empire, and finally ending with His resurrection. Jesus is still alive, and His Spirit lives inside every person who has accepted His invitation. Will you consider this invitation? You can pray to God at any time, and ask Him for salvation from sin. When you pray this prayer, you will know for certain that you will be with Him in heaven when this life is over. There is no greater peace than the peace which we have between God and us, through Jesus Christ.

Description:
Video: 720x480, 29fps, 4.2mbps
Audio: 192kbps, 2 channels, 48kHz
Languages: Bengali, Kannada, Panjabi, Sinhalese
